name: 6 Minutes To Live
description:
This is my second game, made for the Brackeys 2023.1 Gamejam.

At the beginning , you get some characteristics like colorblindness, slowness, or speed, power, short, even bald ! The goal is to have the most points at the end of the 6 minutes / before dying. Have fun !

Controls : 

A - Q : Left

D : Right

Left Mouse : Attack and pickup (mushrooms, enter in the cauldron interface,...)

Space : Jump

E : Inventory
